tool.help:
Correct all matrices ====================
scHicCorrectmatrices is a tool to correct all Hi-C matrices stored in the provided scool file using HiCExplorer's KR algorithm, which is detailed here: https://hicexplorer.readthedocs.io/en/latest/content/tools/hicCorrectMatrix.html
For more information about scHiCExplorer please consider our documentation on readthedocs.io_
.. _readthedocs.io: http://schicexplorer.readthedocs.io/
